messages.subject: RE: car games
messages.msgSnippet: My 6 year old daughter, Daisy, really likes to have something to do while we drive.  Music has always been a huge help, even for short drives around town.
messages.messageBody:
My 6 year old daughter, Daisy, really likes to have something to do while we
drive. Music has always been a huge help, even for short drives around
town. Sometimes on longer drives we listen to books on tape. We've had a
lot of fun lately playing "animal, vegetable, or mineral." If it's a short
drive, we might get in only two or three games; we've played it as long as
half an hour on other occasions.
______
So if anyone has any other car game ideas to pass the time I need some more
ideas. Somehow I seem to be drawing a blank on this... Perhaps I grew up
in a "Dad expects us to sit quietly in the back seat" family because I
can't think of a single thing that I used to have fun with in the car when
I was a kid.
